title: 06/23/21 DPS Hour 1 Tim Legler
itunes:title: 06/23/21 DPS Hour 1 Tim Legler
description:
Tim Legler talks to Dan about the final play that Phoenix ran at the end of game 2 of the Western Conference Finals. Tim says he scored his first NBA points of his career in Phoenix on a 10 day contract.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
